Scene:
The Torture of Chujohime in the Snow
(Chūjōhime yukizeme / 中将姫雪責)

Play: The Pines on Mount Hibari (ひばり山(鶊山)姫捨松)

Production: January 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))



Other Musicians (Koto/Kokyu):

Tsuruzawa Katsunosuke (鶴澤勝之輔)
